ygData.authorName: The weather is here, wish you were beaut
ygData.from: "The weather is here, wish you were beautiful" <douglas@...>
ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 129
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Make it two people who have complained.  Basic etiquette has asked for many years that sig files be kept to four lines or less of 80 characters or less. --
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 13 Sep 1999, dlobdell wrote:

> Well that is my automatic signature, and in no way do I intend on
> removing it for YOU, since you have been the only person to point it
> out.

Make it two people who have complained. Basic etiquette has asked for
many years that sig files be kept to four lines or less of 80 characters
or less.
--
"I would not mind you in my head," Lews Therin said, sounding almost
sane, "if you were not so clearly mad."
